name: Candy's Chaos Land (Demo)
description:
🍭Can you escape Candy's Land alive by guessing all the quizzes right? 

Well, good luck because you're going to need it.🍬

This is a Demo if you like a full version please support this game and let me know.  In the comment down below. Thank you!💜

Game Type

🍨Demo

🍫Horror/Creepy.

🍦 Funny.

🍭 Quiz Game.

 🍬 Visual Novel gameplay.

If you like this game try out my other game

ABC Sunshine And The Midnight Daycare features mystery and Horror.
